languages.text: {n}Вайс жует губы, словно пробует ваши слова на вкус.{/n} "Полагаю, вы бы могли, Ваша Светлость. Однако я не смею рисковать вашей безопасностью. Что за хормейстер погубит своего Лорд-капитана?"
languages.translation_comment: Если у игрока взята телепатия в списке талантов
Если у игрока взята телепатия в списке талантов

languages.text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вайс жует губы, словно пробует ваши слова на вкус.{/n} "Полагаю, вы бы могли, Ваша Светлость. Однако я не смею рисковать вашей безопасностью. Что за хормейстер погубит своего Лорд-капитана?"

{n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

{n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

languages.text: {n}Weisz se muerde los labios, como si saboreara tus palabras.{/n} «Supongo que podría hacerlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, no me atrevería a arriesgar su vida. ¿Qué clase de maestro del Coro deja morir a su Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz se muerde los labios, como si saboreara tus palabras.{/n} «Supongo que podría hacerlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, no me atrevería a arriesgar su vida. ¿Qué clase de maestro del Coro deja morir a su Lord Capitán?».

languages.text: {n}ワイズは、その言葉を味わうように唇を噛んだ。{/n}「陛下ならできるかもしれない。しかし、あなたを危険に晒す勇気は、さらさらない。己のロード・キャプテンを死に追いやるクワイアーマスターがいるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズは、その言葉を味わうように唇を噛んだ。{/n}「陛下ならできるかもしれない。しかし、あなたを危険に晒す勇気は、さらさらない。己のロード・キャプテンを死に追いやるクワイアーマスターがいるだろうか？」

languages.text: {n}威茨抿着嘴，似乎在思考你的提议。{/n}“我猜您确实是个合适的人选，大人。不过，我不敢拿您的生命安全冒险。万一我害死了自己的领主舰长，那我还算哪门子的唱诗大师？”
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨抿着嘴，似乎在思考你的提议。{/n}“我猜您确实是个合适的人选，大人。不过，我不敢拿您的生命安全冒险。万一我害死了自己的领主舰长，那我还算哪门子的唱诗大师？”

languages.text: {n}Weisz beißt sich auf die Lippe, als würde er deine Worte kosten wollen.{/n} "Das könntet Ihr wohl, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Doch ich würde es nicht wagen, Eure Sicherheit zu gefährden. Welcher ordentliche Chormeister lässt schon zu, dass sein Lord Captain getötet wird?"
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz beißt sich auf die Lippe, als würde er deine Worte kosten wollen.{/n} "Das könntet Ihr wohl, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Doch ich würde es nicht wagen, Eure Sicherheit zu gefährden. Welcher ordentliche Chormeister lässt schon zu, dass sein Lord Captain getötet wird?"

languages.text: {n}Weisz se mord les lèvres, comme pour goûter vos paroles.{/n} « Vous en avez sans nul doute les capacités, Votre Seigneurie, mais je n'oserais jamais vous exposer à un tel danger. Quel genre de maître de chœur courrait le risque de tuer {mf|son|sa} propre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz se mord les lèvres, comme pour goûter vos paroles.{/n} « Vous en avez sans nul doute les capacités, Votre Seigneurie, mais je n'oserais jamais vous exposer à un tel danger. Quel genre de maître de chœur courrait le risque de tuer {mf|son|sa} propre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »

languages.text: {n}Weisz, sözlerinin tadını almaya çalışıyormuşçasına dudaklarını ısırıyor.{/n} "Sanırım edebilirsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak güvenliğinizi tehlikeye atmaya cüret edemem. Ne tür bir Koro Şefi, kendi Lord Kaptanını öldürür?"
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz chews his lips, as though tasting your words.{/n} "I suppose you could, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However, I would not dare put your safety at risk. What kind of a Choirmaster gets their own Lord Captain killed?"
